text: The University of Technology Sydney (UTS) is a public research university in Sydney, Australia. It was founded in 1988. UTS has 9 faculties and schools. It offers 130 undergraduate courses and 210 postgraduate courses. The university also has over 45 research centres and institutes. These centres often work with businesses and governments. UTS has more than 180 clubs and societies. The university's sports teams compete in national sports events. As of 2023, UTS has over 290,000 alumni in 140 countries. == References == Category:1988 establishments in Australia Category:Colleges and universities in Australia
title: University of Technology Sydney
